incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Etisalat Network in Egypt

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays to Etisalat network in Egypt. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS Delivery Delays to Etisalat Network in Egypt. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Ufone Network in Pakistan

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS Delivery Delays to Ufone Network in Pakistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Voice Quality Call Issues to Multiple Countries in Europe

incident_updates.body: We have seen stability in the quality of calls, nevertheless the problem has not been totally resolved and we can experience recurrence in quality degradation due to high packet loss in calls to and from multiple countries in Europe. Therefore, we continue to monitor the service to ensure a full recovery and service stability. We’ll provide another update on 05/16/2023 at 10:25 PDT hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still observing a recovery from the voice quality issues due to high packet loss impacting calls to multiple European countries. We are monitoring the service and we'll continue to do so to ensure a full recovery. We'll provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - U Mobile

incident_updates.body: The U Mobile network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 May 2023 at 11:00 PDT until 15 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from U Mobile Malaysia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 May 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 15 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio France phone numbers.

The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 May 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 15 May 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Belarus SMS Carrier Maintenance - A1, MTS , Life

incident_updates.body: The A1, MTS and Life Network in Belarus is conducting a planned maintenance From 16 May 2023 at 00:30 PDT until 16 May 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from A1, MTS and Life handsets.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 16 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in Ireland is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 May 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 16 May 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Ireland phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in Spain is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 May 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 16 May 2023 at 16:15 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failure & disconnects for calls to and from Twilio Spain phone numbers over a subset of long code & Toll-free.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 May 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 16 May 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Austria, Indonesia, Italy, UK
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Lookup SIM Swap - 3 Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Identity Match - Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 May 2023 at 01:30 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 02:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS from and to Chile, Mexico and Taiwan handsets via a subset of domestic longcodes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting planned maintenance from 17  May 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 18 May 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 June 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 12 June 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from UK handsets.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting an emergency maintenance from 14 May 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 15 May 2023 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 10 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
11 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 11 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
15 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 15 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
17 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
